column5: Due to time restraints decided to fish close to home today.Had a really good day ended up with 20 nice perch with some fattys mixed in.Live minnows still fished and small shad bodies worked slowly were fairly even today with a couple of doubleheaders.
Nice haul.  That first one is quite plump.
Measured at 13 1/2 inches probably more than 1.5 lbs.Very plump!Don't usually keep these fish but it was lake ontario area anw wasn't worried about hurting the population.

Nice feed there Ted. Get them in the same area we fished?  It sure is a nice bonus not having to drive over an hour to get on the ice for some perch.  Be careful with now many you eat though...cause if you get pregnant...it's bad for the baby.
